__e: You seem to have told all and sundry. Meaning me, I suppose.
Why didn't you tell anyone when you knew he was dead?
You said before, I'm your legacy your proud gift to the world.
Yes... yes. Look, I know how you feel, sister but, like you say, I'm not a child any more, so I refuse
Well, you said yourself that if anything did happen, it must have happened in broad daylight.
I mean, if you said you did, which you didn't- Well, I mean you did say it, but you didn't do it.
You were just then, when you said it, but you're not in it now, you're not in it now, you're not in it now.
Oh, yes, you told ME, but I don't believe you.
Is that why you killed him?
I can't file a report that you killed him.
I don't think so Beatrice, I think you did it for yourself.
You don't want me to believe you did it for me? !
Everything you've done, you've done for him.
- Oh, come now! - It felt not only as if you meant it... but as though you felt you had a right to.
I know you made me angry intentionally to see whether I care about you
You mean, you expect us to believe that you did that on purpose?
Everything you've done, you've done for him.
"Everything you ever done was with me...
I know you did it for me.
When did you see him last?
When did you see him last time?
When was the last time you saw it?
If you saw, you must tell us.
They say he's here, haven't seen him?
You've seen him, what's wrong with him?
I want to know why you haven't told me.
- You've known about this six weeks... and you haven't even told me, your own wife?
But you didn't do this for yourself.
I realize you don't have it, but you know where it is.
"I'd like to be there for you, "even though you were never there for me."
- Yeah, well, I have, it's just it's no picnic.
Go ahead and do whatever you want with my body, it's never stopped you before!
How you ever make it with your wife, I don't know.
You told me that 19 years ago and I didn't like it.
That's what you told us this morning, and I'm finding it... increasingly hard to believe.
Go ahead and do whatever you want with my body, it's never stopped you before!
That's what you told us this morning, and I'm finding it... increasingly hard to believe.
How you ever make it with your wife, I don't know.
